{
  "schema_version": "1.0.0",
  "name": "go-development-assistant",
  "version": "2.1.0",
  "description": "Comprehensive Go/Golang development plugin with 8 specialized agents and 12 Golden Format skills for concurrency, web development, DevOps, and cloud-native applications",

    "name": "Dr. Umit Kacar & Muhsin Elcicek",
    "email": "kacarumit.phd@gmail.com"
  },

    "./skills/go-concurrency/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/go-web-apis/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/go-database/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/go-testing/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/go-cli-tools/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/go-grpc/SKILL.md",

  "commands": [
    "./commands/go-check.md",
    "./commands/go-new.md",
    "./commands/go-build.md",
    "./commands/go-debug.md"
  ]
}
files.README.md:
[![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-2.1.0-blue?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-go/releases) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Custom-yellow?style=for-the-badge)](LICENSE) [![Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/Status-Production-brightgreen?style=for-the-badge)](#) [![SASMP](https://img.shields.io/badge/SASMP-v1.3.0-blueviolet?style=for-the-badge)](#) [![Agents](https://img.shields.io/badge/Agents-8-orange?style=flat-square&logo=robot)](#-agents) [![Skills](https://img.shields.io/badge/Skills-12-purple?style=flat-square&logo=lightning)](#-skills) [![Commands](https://img.shields.io/badge/Commands-4-green?style=flat-square&logo=terminal)](#-commands)
[ğŸ“¦ **Install Now**](#-quick-start) Â· [ğŸ¤– **Explore Agents**](#-agents) Â· [ğŸ“– **Documentation**](#-documentation) Â· [â­ **Star this repo**](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-go) --- ### What is this? > **Go Development Assistant** is a Claude Code plugin with **8 agents** and **12 skills** for Go development. Master concurrency, web development, microservices, and cloud-native applications with expert AI agents.
--- ## ğŸ“‘ Table of Contents
Click to expand - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Features](#-features) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Documentation](#-documentation) - [Contributing](#-contributing) - [License](#-license)
--- ## ğŸš€ Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation (Choose One)
Option 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash # Step 1ï¸âƒ£ Add the marketplace /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-go # Step 2ï¸âƒ£ Install the plugin /plugin install go-development-assistant@pluginagentmarketplace-go # Step 3ï¸âƒ£ Restart Claude Code # Close and reopen your terminal/IDE ```
Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-go.git cd custom-plugin-go # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```
### âœ… Verify Installation After restart, you should see these agents: ``` go-development-assistant:01-go-fundamentals go-development-assistant:02-go-concurrency go-development-assistant:03-go-web go-development-assistant:04-go-database go-development-assistant:05-go-testing go-development-assistant:06-go-cli go-development-assistant:07-go-microservices go-development-assistant:08-go-devops ``` --- ## âœ¨ Features | Feature | Description | |---------|-------------| | ğŸ¤– **8 Agents** | Specialized AI agents for Go tasks | | ğŸ› ï¸ **12 Skills** | Reusable capabilities with Golden Format | | âŒ¨ï¸ **4 Commands** | Quick slash commands | | ğŸ”„ **SASMP v1.3.0** | Full protocol compliance | | ğŸ¹ **Cloud Native** | Goroutines, channels, Kubernetes ready | --- ## ğŸ¤– Agents ### 8 Specialized Agents | # | Agent | Purpose | |---|-------|---------| | 1 | **01-go-fundamentals** | Go basics, syntax, variables, control flow | | 2 | **02-go-concurrency** | Goroutines, channels, sync primitives | | 3 | **03-go-web** | HTTP servers, Gin, REST APIs | | 4 | **04-go-database** | SQL, GORM, data persistence | | 5 | **05-go-testing** | Unit tests, benchmarks, coverage | | 6 | **06-go-cli** | CLI application development | | 7 | **07-go-microservices** | gRPC, service architecture | | 8 | **08-go-devops** | Docker, Kubernetes, deployment | --- ## ğŸ› ï¸ Skills ### Available Skills | Skill | Description | Invoke | |-------|-------------|--------| | `go-fundamentals` | Go language basics | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-fundamentals")` | | `go-concurrency` | Goroutines and channels | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-concurrency")` | | `go-web-apis` | HTTP and REST development | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-web-apis")` | | `go-database` | SQL and ORM patterns | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-database")` | | `go-testing` | Testing strategies | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-testing")` | | `go-cli-tools` | CLI development | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-cli-tools")` | | `go-grpc` | gRPC and Protocol Buffers | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-grpc")` | | `go-docker` | Containerization | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-docker")` | | `go-cli` | Command-line interfaces | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-cli")` | | `go-performance` | Optimization techniques | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-performance")` | | `go-kubernetes` | K8s deployment | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-kubernetes")` | | `go-modules` | Module management | `Skill("go-development-assistant:go-modules")` | --- ## âŒ¨ï¸ Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/go-check` | Run comprehensive quality checks | | `/go-new` | Create new Go project | | `/go-build` | Build for multiple platforms | | `/go-debug` | Debug with Delve | --- ## ğŸ“š Documentation | Document | Description | |----------|-------------| | [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md) | Version history | | [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) | How to contribute | | [LICENSE](LICENSE) | License information | --- ## ğŸ“ Project Structure
Click to expand ``` custom-plugin-go/ â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ .claude-plugin/ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ plugin.json â”‚ â””â”€â”€ marketplace.json â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ agents/ # 8 agents â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ skills/ # 12 skills (Golden Format) â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ commands/ # 4 commands â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ hooks/ â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“„ README.md â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“„ CHANGELOG.md â””â”€â”€ ğŸ“„ LICENSE ```
--- ## ğŸ“… Metadata | Field | Value | |-------|-------| | **Version** | 2.1.0 | | **Last Updated** | 2025-12-31 | | **Status** | Production Ready | | **SASMP** | v1.3.0 | | **Agents** | 8 | | **Skills** | 12 | | **Commands** | 4 | --- ## ğŸ¤ Contributing Contributions are welcome! Please read our [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md). 1. Fork the repository 2. Create your feature branch 3. Follow the Golden Format for new skills 4. Submit a pull request --- ## âš ï¸ Security > **Important:** This repository contains third-party code and dependencies. > > - âœ… Always review code before using in production > - âœ… Check dependencies for known vulnerabilities > - âœ… Follow security best practices > - âœ… Report security issues privately via [Issues](../../issues) --- ## ğŸ“ License Copyright Â© 2025 **Dr. Umit Kacar** & **Muhsin Elcicek** Custom License - See [LICENSE](LICENSE) for details. --- ## ğŸ‘¥ Contributors
Dr. Umit Kacar
Senior AI Researcher & Engineer 		Muhsin Elcicek
Senior Software Architect
---

files..claude-plugin/plugin.json:
{
  "name": "react-native-development-assistant",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "React Native plugin with specialized agents for mobile development, navigation, native modules, and cross-platform apps",
  "author": "Developer Roadmap Community",
  "repository": "https://github.com/kamranahmedse/developer-roadmap",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "keywords": [
    "learning",
    "developer",
    "roadmap",
    "career-path",
    "skills",
    "education"
  ],
  "agents": [
    "./agents/01-react-native-fundamentals.md",
    "./agents/02-react-native-navigation.md",
    "./agents/03-react-native-state.md",
    "./agents/04-react-native-native.md",
    "./agents/05-react-native-animation.md",
    "./agents/06-react-native-testing.md",
    "./agents/07-react-native-deploy.md"
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "learn",
      "path": "./commands/learn.md",
      "description": "Start your learning journey and select a career path"
    },
    {
      "name": "browse-agent",
      "path": "./commands/browse-agent.md",
      "description": "Explore all 7 specialized agents and their roadmaps"
    },
    {
      "name": "assess",
      "path": "./commands/assess.md",
      "description": "Evaluate your knowledge and get personalized recommendations"
    },
    {
      "name": "roadmaps",
      "path": "./commands/roadmaps.md",
      "description": "Browse all 65+ developer roadmaps by category"
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    "./skills/react-native-basics/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/react-native-navigation/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/react-native-state/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/react-native-animations/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/react-native-native-modules/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/react-native-testing/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/react-native-deployment/SKILL.md"
  ]
}

Expert | | 5 | **04-data-ai-ml** | Master data science, machine learning, and AI. Expert in Pyt | | 6 | **07-security-specializations** | Master cybersecurity, compliance, blockchain, QA, and specia | | 7 | **02-backend-api-development** | Master backend systems, RESTful and GraphQL APIs, and server | --- ## ğŸ› ï¸ Skills ### Available Skills | Skill | Description | Invoke | |-------|-------------|--------| | `backend-technologies` | Work with backend languages (Python, PHP, Go, Rust, Java, Ko | `Skill("react-native-assistant:backend-technologies")` | | `system-architecture` | Design scalable and maintainable systems using design patter | `Skill("react-native-assistant:system-architecture")` | | `cloud-devops` | Deploy and manage infrastructure using AWS, Docker, Kubernet | `Skill("react-native-assistant:cloud-devops")` | | `data-science-ai` | Apply machine learning, deep learning, data analysis, and AI | `Skill("react-native-assistant:data-science-ai")` | | `mobile-technologies` | Build native and cross-platform mobile applications using Re | `Skill("react-native-assistant:mobile-technologies")` | | `frontend-technologies` | Master HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and modern fronten | `Skill("react-native-assistant:frontend-technologies")` | | `security-compliance` | Implement security best practices, cryptography, application | `Skill("react-native-assistant:security-compliance")` | --- ## âŒ¨ï¸ Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/learn` | Learn Command | | `/assess` | Assess Command | | `/browse-agent` | Browse Agent Command | | `/roadmaps` | Roadmaps Command | --- ## ğŸ“š Documentation | Document | Description | |----------|-------------| | [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md) | Version history | | [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) | How to contribute | | [LICENSE](LICENSE) | License information | --- ## ğŸ“ Project Structure

marketplaces.description: Claude Code plugin for flutter development
marketplaces.repo_description: Flutter development plugin for Claude Code

files..claude-plugin/plugin.json:
{
  "name": "custom-plugin-flutter",
  "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "Industrial-grade Flutter development plugin with 8 specialized agents and 12 production-ready skills covering UI, state management, backend integration, database design, performance optimization, testing, DevOps, and native platform integration. 15,500+ lines of expert content, 200+ code examples, 25+ projects.",
  "author": "Custom Plugin Development Team",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "repository": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-flutter.git",
  "eqhm_enabled": true,
  "keywords": [
    "flutter",
    "dart",
    "custom-plugin-flutter",
    "mobile-development",
    "ui-development",
    "state-management",
    "backend-integration",
    "database-design",
    "performance-optimization",
    "testing-qa",
    "devops-deployment",
    "platform-integration",
    "accessibility",
    "animations",
    "navigation",
    "localization",
    "plugins",
    "production-ready",
    "enterprise-architecture"
  ],
  "agents": [
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-ui",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: UI Development",
      "description": "Deep expertise in Flutter widget systems, constraint-based layouts, Material Design 3, Cupertino design, custom widget composition, animation frameworks, and responsive design patterns for cross-platform excellence.",
      "path": "./agents/01-flutter-ui-development.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-state-management",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: State Management",
      "description": "Master all state management patterns: setState, Provider, Riverpod, BLoC, GetX. Deep expertise in dependency injection, state persistence, serialization, and scalable architecture patterns for enterprise applications.",
      "path": "./agents/02-state-management.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-backend",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Backend Integration",
      "description": "Complete backend integration mastery: HTTP clients (http, Dio, Chopper), REST APIs, GraphQL, WebSockets, JWT authentication, Firebase integration, error handling, real-time data synchronization, and API architecture patterns.",
      "path": "./agents/03-backend-integration.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-database",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Database & Storage",
      "description": "Expert-level database architecture: SharedPreferences, Hive, SQLite, ObjectBox, Firestore, Realtime Database. Schema design, migrations, encryption, offline-first patterns, conflict resolution, and intelligent sync strategies.",
      "path": "./agents/04-database-storage.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-performance",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Performance Optimization",
      "description": "Deep performance engineering: build optimization, 60+ FPS rendering, memory profiling, asset optimization, code splitting, image handling, network efficiency, battery optimization, APK/IPA size reduction, and production monitoring.",
      "path": "./agents/05-performance-optimization.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-testing",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Testing & QA",
      "description": "Comprehensive testing mastery: unit tests, widget tests, integration tests, E2E testing, test coverage metrics, mocking strategies, CI/CD integration, performance testing, accessibility testing, and quality gates.",
      "path": "./agents/06-testing-qa.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-devops",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: DevOps & Deployment",
      "description": "Production deployment expertise: iOS/Android build systems, code signing, App Store/Google Play submission, CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Fastlane), release management, beta testing, crash reporting, and production monitoring.",
      "path": "./agents/07-devops-deployment.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-platform-native",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Platform & Native Integration",
      "description": "Platform integration specialist: Platform channels (Method, Event, Basic Message), iOS Swift/Objective-C interop, Android Kotlin/Java interop, federated plugin architecture, native UI embedding, background processing, and cross-platform feature parity.",
      "path": "./agents/08-flutter-platform-native.md"
    }
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-learn",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Learn",
      "description": "Structured learning paths - Beginner (0-6mo), Intermediate (6-12mo), Advanced (12+mo) with clear progression and skill milestones",
      "path": "./commands/learn.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-agents",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Browse Agents",
      "description": "Explore all 8 specialized agents with detailed capabilities, expertise areas, and integration patterns",
      "path": "./commands/browse-agent.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-assess",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Assess",
      "description": "Self-assessment tool - 50+ questions across 8 Flutter development domains to evaluate knowledge level and identify growth areas",
      "path": "./commands/assess.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-projects",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter: Projects",
      "description": "25+ hands-on project ideas from beginner to advanced - TodoApp, ChatApp, E-commerce, Marketplace, ML integration, and enterprise applications",
      "path": "./commands/projects.md"
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-ui",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-ui",
      "description": "1700+ lines of Flutter UI mastery - widgets, layouts, Material Design, animations, responsive design with production-ready code examples",
      "path": "./skills/flutter-ui/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-state",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-state",
      "description": "2300+ lines of state management expertise - all patterns with code examples, testing strategies, and architecture patterns",
      "path": "./skills/state-management/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-backend",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-backend",
      "description": "1500+ lines of backend integration - REST, GraphQL, WebSocket, Firebase, authentication, serialization, and error handling",
      "path": "./skills/backend-integration/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-database",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-database",
      "description": "1800+ lines of database architecture - all storage solutions, schema design, encryption, offline-first, sync strategies",
      "path": "./skills/database-storage/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-performance",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-performance",
      "description": "1600+ lines of performance optimization - profiling, memory management, rendering, size reduction, battery efficiency",
      "path": "./skills/performance/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-testing",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-testing",
      "description": "1600+ lines of testing mastery - all test types, mocking, CI/CD integration, coverage metrics, accessibility testing",
      "path": "./skills/testing/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-devops",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-devops",
      "description": "1800+ lines of DevOps expertise - CI/CD pipelines, code signing, app store submission, monitoring, automation",
      "path": "./skills/devops/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-accessibility",
      "displayName": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-accessibility",

      "path": "./skills/accessibility/SKILL.md"
    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-animations",

    {

    },
    {
      "name": "custom-plugin-flutter-skill-plugins",

      "description": "Plugin development mastery - Platform channels, federated architecture, MethodChannel/EventChannel, iOS Swift/Android Kotlin integration, pub.dev publishing",
      "path": "./skills/plugins/SKILL.md"
    }
  ],

    "contentLines": 18500,
    "codeExamples": 250,

[![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-1.0.0-blue?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-flutter/releases) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Custom-yellow?style=for-the-badge)](LICENSE) [![Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/Status-Production-brightgreen?style=for-the-badge)](#) [![SASMP](https://img.shields.io/badge/SASMP-v1.3.0-blueviolet?style=for-the-badge)](#) [![Agents](https://img.shields.io/badge/Agents-8-orange?style=flat-square&logo=robot)](#-agents) [![Skills](https://img.shields.io/badge/Skills-12-purple?style=flat-square&logo=lightning)](#-skills) [![Commands](https://img.shields.io/badge/Commands-4-green?style=flat-square&logo=terminal)](#-commands)
[ğŸ“¦ **Install Now**](#-quick-start) Â· [ğŸ¤– **Explore Agents**](#-agents) Â· [ğŸ“– **Documentation**](#-documentation) Â· [â­ **Star this repo**](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-flutter) --- ### What is this? > **Flutter Assistant** is a Claude Code plugin with **8 agents** and **12 skills** for flutter development.
--- ## ğŸ“‘ Table of Contents
Click to expand - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Features](#-features) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Documentation](#-documentation) - [Contributing](#-contributing) - [License](#-license)
--- ## ğŸš€ Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation (Choose One)
Option 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash # Step 1ï¸âƒ£ Add the marketplace /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-flutter # Step 2ï¸âƒ£ Install the plugin /plugin install custom-plugin-flutter@pluginagentmarketplace-flutter # Step 3ï¸âƒ£ Restart Claude Code # Close and reopen your terminal/IDE ```
Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-flutter.git cd custom-plugin-flutter # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```
### âœ… Verify Installation After restart, you should see these agents: ``` custom-plugin-flutter:01-flutter-ui-development custom-plugin-flutter:04-database-storage custom-plugin-flutter:03-backend-integration custom-plugin-flutter:05-performance-optimization custom-plugin-flutter:02-state-management ... and 2 more ``` --- ## âœ¨ Features | Feature | Description | |---------|-------------| | ğŸ¤– **8 Agents** | Specialized AI agents for flutter tasks | | ğŸ› ï¸ **12 Skills** | Reusable capabilities with Golden Format | | âŒ¨ï¸ **4 Commands** | Quick slash commands | | ğŸ”„ **SASMP v1.3.0** | Full protocol compliance | --- ## ğŸ¤– Agents ### 8 Specialized Agents | # | Agent | Purpose | |---|-------|---------| | 1 | **01-flutter-ui-development** | custom-plugin-flutter UI expert - Deep mastery of widget sys | | 2 | **04-database-storage** | custom-plugin-flutter database architect - Expert-level mast | | 3 | **03-backend-integration** | custom-plugin-flutter backend integration specialist - Compl | | 4 | **05-performance-optimization** | custom-plugin-flutter performance engineer - Deep expertise | | 5 | **02-state-management** | custom-plugin-flutter state management architect - Expert in | | 6 | **07-devops-deployment** | custom-plugin-flutter DevOps specialist - Production-grade d | | 7 | **06-testing-qa** | custom-plugin-flutter QA specialist - Comprehensive testing | --- ## ğŸ› ï¸ Skills ### Available Skills | Skill | Description | Invoke | |-------|-------------|--------| | `backend-integration` | 1500+ lines of backend integration mastery - REST APIs, Grap | `Skill("custom-plugin-flutter:backend-integration")` | | `devops` | 1800+ lines of DevOps mastery - CI/CD, code signing, app sto | `Skill("custom-plugin-flutter:devops")` | | `flutter-ui` | 1700+ lines of Flutter UI mastery - widgets, layouts, Materi | `Skill("custom-plugin-flutter:flutter-ui")` | | `testing` | 1600+ lines of testing mastery - unit tests, widget tests, i | `Skill("custom-plugin-flutter:testing")` | | `state-management` | 2300+ lines of state management mastery - all patterns (Prov | `Skill("custom-plugin-flutter:state-management")` | | `performance` | 1600+ lines of performance optimization mastery - profiling, | `Skill("custom-plugin-flutter:performance")` | | `database-storage` | 1800+ lines of database architecture mastery - SQLite, Hive, | `Skill("custom-plugin-flutter:database-storage")` | --- ## âŒ¨ï¸ Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/learn` | custom-plugin-flutter: Learn | | `/assess` | custom-plugin-flutter: Assess | | `/browse-agent` | custom-plugin-flutter: Browse Agents | | `/projects` | custom-plugin-flutter: Projects | --- ## ğŸ“š Documentation | Document | Description | |----------|-------------| | [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md) | Version history | | [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) | How to contribute | | [LICENSE](LICENSE) | License information | --- ## ğŸ“ Project Structure
Click to expand ``` custom-plugin-flutter/ â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ .claude-plugin/ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ plugin.json â”‚ â””â”€â”€ marketplace.json â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ agents/ # 8 agents â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ skills/ # 12 skills (Golden Format) â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ commands/ # 4 commands â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ hooks/ â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“„ README.md â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“„ CHANGELOG.md â””â”€â”€ ğŸ“„ LICENSE ```

Please read our [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md). 1. Fork the repository 2. Create your feature branch 3. Follow the Golden Format for new skills 4. Submit a pull request --- ## âš ï¸ Security > **Important:** This repository contains third-party code and dependencies. > > - âœ… Always review code before using in production > - âœ… Check dependencies for known vulnerabilities > - âœ… Follow security best practices > - âœ… Report security issues privately via [Issues](../../issues) --- ## ğŸ“ License Copyright Â© 2025 **Dr. Umit Kacar** & **Muhsin Elcicek** Custom License - See [LICENSE](LICENSE) for details. --- ## ğŸ‘¥ Contributors

--- ## ğŸ“‘ Table of Contents

--- ## ğŸš€ Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation (Choose One)

Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-ai-engineer.git cd custom-plugin-ai-engineer # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```

ğŸ¤– Agents ### 6 Specialized Agents | # | Agent | Purpose | |---|-------|---------| | 1 | **04-fine-tuning** | Master LLM fine-tuning techniques including LoRA, QLoRA, and | | 2 | **03-rag-systems** | Build production RAG systems with vector databases, embeddin | | 3 | **06-ai-agents** | Build autonomous AI agents with tool use, planning, and mult | | 4 | **02-prompt-engineering** | Master prompt design, optimization techniques, and effective | | 5 | **05-evaluation-monitoring** | Implement LLM evaluation frameworks, monitoring, and observa | | 6 | **01-llm-fundamentals** | Master LLM architecture, tokenization, transformer models, a | --- ## ğŸ› ï¸ Skills ### Available Skills | Skill | Description | Invoke | |-------|-------------|--------| | `vector-databases` | Vector database selection, indexing strategies, and semantic | `Skill("ai-engineer-plugin:vector-databases")` | | `model-deployment` | LLM deployment strategies including vLLM, TGI, and cloud inf | `Skill("ai-engineer-plugin:model-deployment")` | | `rag-systems` | Retrieval Augmented Generation systems with vector search, d | `Skill("ai-engineer-plugin:rag-systems")` | | `prompt-engineering` | Prompt design, optimization, few-shot learning, and chain of | `Skill("ai-engineer-plugin:prompt-engineering")` | | `llm-basics` | LLM architecture, tokenization, transformers, and inference | `Skill("ai-engineer-plugin:llm-basics")` | | `fine-tuning` | LLM fine-tuning with LoRA, QLoRA, and instruction tuning for | `Skill("ai-engineer-plugin:fine-tuning")` | | `agent-frameworks` | AI agent development with LangChain, CrewAI, AutoGen, and to | `Skill("ai-engineer-plugin:agent-frameworks")` | | `evaluation-metrics` | LLM evaluation frameworks, benchmarks, and quality metrics f | `Skill("ai-engineer-plugin:evaluation-metrics")` | --- ## âŒ¨ï¸ Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/ai-engineer` | AI Engineer assistant for LLM development, RAG systems, and AI applications | | `/prompt-lab` | Interactive prompt engineering lab for designing, testing, and optimizing prompts | | `/rag-builder` | RAG system builder for creating production-ready retrieval augmented generation pipelines | --- ## ğŸ“š Documentation | Document | Description | |----------|-------------| | [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md) | Version history | | [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) | How to contribute | | [LICENSE](LICENSE) | License information | --- ## {
  "name": "ios-development-assistant",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "iOS development plugin with agents for Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI, and App Store deployment",
  "author": "Roadmap Team",
  "homepage": "https://roadmap.sh",
  "repository": "https://github.com/kamranahmedse/developer-roadmap",
  "keywords": [
    "learning",
    "roadmap",
    "developer",
    "career-path",
    "ai-ml",
    "frontend",
    "backend",
    "devops",
    "mobile",
    "games",
    "specialized-roles",
    "fundamentals"
  ],
  "agents": [
    "./agents/01-ios-fundamentals.md",
    "./agents/02-uikit-development.md",
    "./agents/03-swiftui-development.md",
    "./agents/04-data-persistence.md",
    "./agents/05-networking-apis.md",
    "./agents/06-testing-debugging.md",
    "./agents/07-app-store.md"
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "learn",
      "path": "./commands/learn.md",
      "description": "Start guided learning path selection for your career goals"
    },
    {
      "name": "browse-roadmap",
      "path": "./commands/browse-roadmap.md",
      "description": "Explore and filter all 75+ available roadmaps by role, technology, or difficulty"
    },
    {
      "name": "assess",
      "path": "./commands/assess.md",
      "description": "Evaluate your current knowledge level and get personalized learning recommendations"
    },
    {
      "name": "compare-paths",
      "path": "./commands/compare-paths.md",
      "description": "Compare learning paths between different roles to find the best fit for your goals"
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    "./skills/ios-fundamentals/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/uikit-development/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/swiftui-development/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/ios-data/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/ios-networking/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/ios-testing/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/app-store/SKILL.md"
  ],
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "changelog": "See CHANGELOG.md for version history"
}

files.README.md:
[![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-2.0.0-blue?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-data-engineer/releases) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Custom-yellow?style=for-the-badge)](LICENSE) [![Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/Status-Production-brightgreen?style=for-the-badge)](#) [![SASMP](https://img.shields.io/badge/SASMP-v1.3.0-blueviolet?style=for-the-badge)](#) [![Agents](https://img.shields.io/badge/Agents-6-orange?style=flat-square&logo=robot)](#-agents) [![Skills](https://img.shields.io/badge/Skills-21-purple?style=flat-square&logo=lightning)](#-skills) [![Commands](https://img.shields.io/badge/Commands-7-green?style=flat-square&logo=terminal)](#-commands)
[ğŸ“¦ **Install Now**](#-quick-start) Â· [ğŸ¤– **Explore Agents**](#-agents) Â· [ğŸ“– **Documentation**](#-documentation) Â· [â­ **Star this repo**](https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-data-engineer) --- ### What is this? > **Data Engineer Assistant** is a Claude Code plugin with **6 agents** and **21 skills** for data engineer development.
--- ## ğŸ“‘ Table of Contents
Click to expand - [Quick Start](#-quick-start) - [Features](#-features) - [Agents](#-agents) - [Skills](#-skills) - [Commands](#-commands) - [Documentation](#-documentation) - [Contributing](#-contributing) - [License](#-license)
--- ## ğŸš€ Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription ### Installation (Choose One)
Option 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash # Step 1ï¸âƒ£ Add the marketplace /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-data-engineer # Step 2ï¸âƒ£ Install the plugin /plugin install data-engineer-development-assistant@pluginagentmarketplace-data-engineer # Step 3ï¸âƒ£ Restart Claude Code # Close and reopen your terminal/IDE ```
Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-data-engineer.git cd custom-plugin-data-engineer # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```
### âœ… Verify Installation After restart, you should see these agents: ``` data-engineer-development-assistant:03-devops-engineer data-engineer-development-assistant:01-data-engineer data-engineer-development-assistant:02-backend-developer data-engineer-development-assistant:04-data-scientist data-engineer-development-assistant:05-cloud-engineer ... and 1 more ``` --- ## âœ¨ Features | Feature | Description | |---------|-------------| | ğŸ¤– **6 Agents** | Specialized AI agents for data engineer tasks | | ğŸ› ï¸ **21 Skills** | Reusable capabilities with Golden Format | | âŒ¨ï¸ **7 Commands** | Quick slash commands | | ğŸ”„ **SASMP v1.3.0** | Full protocol compliance | --- ## ğŸ¤– Agents ### 6 Specialized Agents | # | Agent | Purpose | |---|-------|---------| | 1 | **03-devops-engineer** | Master infrastructure automation, deployment pipelines, and | | 2 | **01-data-engineer** | Master data pipelines, ETL systems, database design, and big | | 3 | **02-backend-developer** | Build robust, scalable backend systems and APIs that power m | | 4 | **04-data-scientist** | Transform data into actionable insights using machine learni | | 5 | **05-cloud-engineer** | Design and manage cloud infrastructure and data platforms on | | 6 | **06-ml-ai-engineer** | Master artificial intelligence, large language models, gener | --- ## ğŸ› ï¸ Skills ### Available Skills | Skill | Description | Invoke | |-------|-------------|--------| | `deep-learning` | TensorFlow, PyTorch, CNNs, RNNs, transformers, neural networ | `Skill("data-engineer-development-assistant:deep-learning")` | | `big-data` | Apache Spark, Hadoop, distributed computing, and large-scale | `Skill("data-engineer-development-assistant:big-data")` | | `api-development` | REST APIs, GraphQL, FastAPI, data service design, and integr | `Skill("data-engineer-development-assistant:api-development")` | | `etl-tools` | Apache Airflow, Spark, Kafka, Flink, dbt, and modern data tr | `Skill("data-engineer-development-assistant:etl-tools")` | | `cloud-platforms` | AWS, Azure, GCP data platforms and cloud-native data solutio | `Skill("data-engineer-development-assistant:cloud-platforms")` | | `mlops` | Model versioning, MLflow, experiment tracking, model registr | `Skill("data-engineer-development-assistant:mlops")` | | `data-warehousing` | Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift, Delta Lake, and data warehous | `Skill("data-engineer-development-assistant:data-warehousing")` | | `containerization` | Docker, Kubernetes, and container orchestration for data app | `Skill("data-engineer-development-assistant:containerization")` | | `sql-databases` | SQL query optimization, schema design, indexing, and relatio | `Skill("data-engineer-development-assistant:sql-databases")` | | `cicd-pipelines` | Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, and automated data pipel | `Skill("data-engineer-development-assistant:cicd-pipelines")` | | ... | +11 more | See skills/ directory | --- ## âŒ¨ï¸ Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/choose-role` | ğŸ¯ Choose Role - Pick Your Data Specialty | | `/project-ideas` | ğŸš€ Project Ideas - Build Your Portfolio | | `/skill-deep-dive` | ğŸ” Skill Deep Dive - Master Any Technology | | `/assessment` | ğŸ“‹ Assessment - Evaluate Your Knowledge | | `/roadmap-status` | ğŸ“Š Roadmap Status - Track Your Progress | | `/interview-prep` | ğŸ’¼ Interview Prep - Get Data Engineering Jobs | | `/start-learning` | ğŸš€ Start Learning - Data Engineering Roadmap | --- ##
